title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 31.1 - Issuance of certificate of insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 31.1 - Issuance of certificate of insurance

State Regulations

Any insurer, any employee or agent of an insurer, any
insurance agent, or any authorized representative of the Assigned Risk Plan, issuing an owner' s policy of liability insurance, or a binder with respect to
such a policy (other than the renewal of an existing policy or renewal
endorsement), pursuant to article 6 of the Vehicle and Traffic Law, shall issue
a certificate of insurance, in a form prescribed by the Commissioner of Motor

Vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
31.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
